relation: "I hope that with all the increased police activity, you aren’t having any trouble, er, conducting business."
"The only difficulty I have encountered is that there are not enough attendees at the racetrack to boost the betting pools."
"I’ll see to it that the police release anybody who’s got a racing sheet on him or who looks clinically depressed enough to go to the track."
pageTitle: Bad Cops - The Simpsons: Tapped Out Wiki

textAfterTable: "I’m not about the past, Apu. I’m all about what the future holds." "And I see my future holding that box of donuts and a free pineapple Squishee." "This is unacceptable! Criminals run willy-nilly in this town and the police do nothing." "I'm going to call newsman Kent Brockman and have him perform an exposé!" "What kind of exposé?" "Hard-hitting!" *gasp* "No need for that! I’ll round up the troops." "I'll even get the S.W.A.T. van back... which I borrowed to take my gym equipment to the dump."
